# reproducible-workflow

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

reproducible-workflow is to minimal repository to demonstrate some core principles of reproducible workflows. 

Presentation available in presentations/reproducibility-101.Rmd

Check out an example reproducible analysis by working through make-reprex.R
